action.action-desc: Mr. Steube introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to establish an authority to issue permits to certain members of the Armed Forces who seek to carry concealed firearms while on military installations.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Safe Bases Act of 2025.

section.header: Permits to carry concealed firearms on military installations

subsection.text: Not later than one year after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Defense shall establish a single element of the Department of Defense to issue, upon request by a covered member, a permit that authorizes that covered member to carry a concealed firearm while on any military installation.
